JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description :  Candidates have to carry out the below mentioned responsibilities:  Must have worked at least 4 years into web development using PHP,  MYSQL,  Javascript,  JQuery etc Understand concepts & fundamentals of Magento & Zend Framework. Design Develop and Deploy Enterprise e- Commerce Applications. knowledge of Magento including coding,  optimization,  customization and integration with 3rd party APIs. Work on Magento Integrations with external systems such as CMS/  CRM /  ERP Payment /  Shipping/ etc. Understand the goals and strategy behind each project from conception through completion. Communicate effectively with team & get work done. Reviews /  testing of project deliverables. Provide technical & non- technical training as required by the team members.
